segments.text: Good afternoon , passport and arrival card please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is this your country of birth or residence .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What is the purpose of your visit to the United States ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long do you plan to stay in the United States ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sir , you didn't fill out the information on your arrival card of where you will be staying .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I'm sorry , but there are a couple of different places I will travel to within the United States , so I wasn't sure what to put .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You must specify an address of the place where you will spend most of your time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have enough means to support yourself while you are here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I have some travellers cheques and two credit cards .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very good . Do you have anything to declare ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nope . I only have my clothes and camera !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very well sir , welcome to the United States , enjoy your visit .
segments.speaker: S1
